title: Mixing English with Japanese text?
content:
Hello,  
I am working on a CD layout. All of the songs are in English except for one that is in Japanese. I'd like to use [FF Info Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023161413/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11189.0.0) for the layout but I'm not sure if there's a Japanese font that goes well with it. I'm willing to change to another sans-serif if a smooth combination is known.  
I'd be very appreciative if anyone has links or information on this question.  
Thank you kindly!
author: roman
